title: Research-Based Online Professional Development for Teachers: Application of the Community of Inquiry (CoI) Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A blended course operating in smartphone-centric limited-tech environments, combining asynchronous online activities with monthly face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners can execute the teacher research design process step-by-step.
Learners can apply the social, cognitive, and teaching presences of the Community of Inquiry (CoI) framework to online collaboration.
Learners can complete research reports by utilizing peer feedback and a mentoring system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
